 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלִיָּה‎</span> **noun feminine** (c. adjective masculine [[Jer.22.14|Jer 22:14]], compare [[BDB#Albr.|Albr]]<sup>ZAW xvi (1896), 83</sup> [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>Synt. § 251 k</sup>) ==roof-chamber== (Late Hebrew ***id.***, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלִיתָא‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> (whence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***dining-room*** as loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>20 f.</sup>); Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עלית‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Epigr. Denkm. 27</sup>); — chamber on roof, cool and secluded: absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Judg.3.23|Judg 3:23]]; [[Judg.3.24|Judg 3:24]]; [[Judg.3.25|Judg 3:25]] (compare [[BDB#Nes|Nes]]<sup>Marg. 13</sup>), [[1Kgs.17.19|1Kgs 17:19]]; [[1Kgs.17.23|1Kgs 17:23]]; [[2Kgs.4.11|2Kgs 4:11]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלִיַּת הַמְּקֵרָה‎</span> [[Judg.3.20|Judg 3:20]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קִֿיר‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.10|2Kgs 4:10]] ***roof-chamber with walls*** (permanent); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשַּׁעַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[2Sam.19.1|2Sam 19:1]], i.e. over the gateway; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַפִּנָּה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[Neh.3.31|Neh 3:31]]; [[Neh.3.32|Neh 3:32]] i.e. at a corner of the wall; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָחָז‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> [[2Kgs.23.12|2Kgs 23:12]] (probably built by A.); suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלִיָּתוֺ‎</span> [[2Kgs.1.2|2Kgs 1:2]] (belonging to Ahaziah); — [[2Chr.9.4|2Chr 9:4]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹלֹתָיו‎</span> (compare \|\| [[1Kgs.10.5|1Kgs 10:5]]); plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלִיּוֺת מְרֻוָּחִים‎</span> [[Jer.22.14|Jer 22:14]] ***spacious roof-chambers***; in Solomon's temple according to [[2Chr.3.9|2Chr 3:9]], so suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלִיּתָיו‎</span> [[1Chr.28.11|1Chr 28:11]] more generally <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלִיּוֺתָיו‎</span> [[Jer.22.13|Jer 22:13]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>'s chambers in sky [[Ps.104.3|Ps 104:3]], containing rain, v[[Ps.104.13|Ps 104:13]].
